title: Manifesting Lightworker's Log
description: Manifesting shares the life of a blossoming lightworker, a teacher of God, as she trusts the unseen, hones her role as co-creator, and follows intuition to create a better reality. A strong connection to the God Network offers increasing synchronicities, to lift the bonds of limitation, as the main character flirts with a world of freedom and wonder. Ever-changing perception blooms into pure states of grace between periods of desperation and limitation. In this deeply personal book, Sam taps into other dimensional realities to rise above life’s trials. She enters a world of freedom and wonder while co-creating experiences of increasing abundance.Manifesting notes physical, mental, and metaphysical signs of the Ascension Process, offers tools and resources to evolve consciously, and gives examples of Spirit’s subtle guiding energy.
author: S.A.M.
